data.name: Scenario-based ZKP Prototype © CSIRO Data61
data.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Researched and learnt about Zero-Knowledge Proof (ZKP) concepts; experimented and tested the libraries supporting ZKP.
Developed a prototype in C++ programming language of a scenario based ZKP verification system via Linux OS.
Presented the built prototype to the CSIRO Data61 researchers; documented and published the prototype to GitHub.

data.name: Data Visualisation App
data.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed the software's user-friendly UI using HTML5, CSS & JavaScript.
Visualised the data inputted by the user by creating tables & graphs.

data.name: Lotus Social Media
data.title: Associate Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Designed new components & prototypes that enhanced the site’s user experience.
Work alongside with the dev team to deploy the proposed prototypes to the existing landing pages.

data.name: Toy Universe Website
data.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Redesigned the site's frontend design using ReactJS.
Worked with the marketing team to strategise the most efficient design for the site.
Worked with the site’s RESTful APIs, and proposed solutions to improve its backend.

data.name: Juicy Bao's Contactless Menu
data.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Made design for the restaurant's online menu.
Handled and restructured data and images from the menu database.
Developed payment methods for the app to be functional and secure.

data.name: Gift Card Messenger App
data.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Worked in a collaborative and agile team to develop and structure JavaScript applications and RESTful Web APIs for the software.
Identified mobile strategies and designed mobile responsive app for multiple operating systems.
Designed, assisted and developed software’s visualisations in accordance with UI/UX theories.
Deployed and tested services with a focus on performance and scalability.

data.name: Dulich9 Website
data.title: Frontend/SEO Developer
responsibilities: Developed the final prototype for the website using ReactJS.
Researched, strategised & deployed different SEO approaches in order to acquire high search ratings.
Deployed unit & system tests to examine new frontend components and the effectiveness of the newly-deployed SEO.

data.name: LifeByte Trading Software
data.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Collaborating with a range of team members and stakeholders.
Developing new user-facing features and building reusable code and libraries for future use.
Ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Validating all the user input before submission to the backend.
Optimising the delivery of code and assets that mobile and browser responsive.
